title: Blossoms revived
creator_credit: Krishna Gopal, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: Shows what is being done to combat the disease poliomyelitis. The stress is on rehabilitation - teaching the limbs to perform their forgotten functions. Concludes by showing how the skill, devotion and service of a band of workers saved a sick child.
